commit.message:
Cordova upgrade (#1615)

* #1489 - Update Cordova plugins

* Update npm to 7.24

* Update npm and npm command

* Fix ssh issues

* Upgrade progressbar module

* try npm install instead of ci for windows, do only android

* Try fixing npm issue

* Update package.json properly

* Try to fix sha512 issue...

* Revert to npm 6

* Fix compilation

* Update build tool to 30

* Try building without gradle, update build-tool to 31

* Add gradle back, try removing the sdkmanager text from build log.

* Change build tools to 30.0.3

* no supress of license text

* Update file transfer plugin to fix whitelist, remove licesne text

* Use old scheme to prevent user data loss

* Update plugin to use version 2.0 of BG location

* Restore other platforms

* bump version to 9.11

* Update plugin version to remove unwnated configurations
